-- * Generated by SqlDBM: Private sewing production by petrushina@bregis.ru *


-- ************************************** main.model_content_amount
CREATE TABLE main.model_content_amount
(
 "id"             serial NOT NULL,
 model_size_id    int NOT NULL,
 model_content_id int NOT NULL,
 amount           int4 NOT NULL,
 create_by        int4 NOT NULL,
 create_date      timestamp NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT PK_19 PRIMARY KEY ( "id" ),
 CONSTRAINT FK_39 FOREIGN KEY ( model_content_id ) REFERENCES main.model_content ( "id" ),
 CONSTRAINT FK_41_1 FOREIGN KEY ( model_size_id ) REFERENCES main.model_size ( "id" )
);

CREATE INDEX FK_2 ON main.model_content_amount
(
 model_content_id
);

CREATE INDEX FK_3 ON main.model_content_amount
(
 model_size_id
);

COMMENT ON TABLE main.model_content_amount IS 'Составные части модели по размерам для расчета расхода материалов (основной материал, доп материал, фурнитура и т п) с указанием кол-ва';

COMMENT ON COLUMN main.model_content_amount.model_size_id IS 'Модель по размерам';
COMMENT ON COLUMN main.model_content_amount.model_content_id IS 'Составные части модели';
COMMENT ON COLUMN main.model_content_amount.amount IS 'Кол-во расходуемого материала';
